resources.string:
Stocki is an application that provides financial data and stock market predictions.
 
Please note that Stocki does not offer financial advice and is not a licensed financial advisor.
 
Any decisions made based on the information or predictions provided by this app are made at your own risk.
 
We strongly recommend reviewing the underlying models and assumptions before relying on any predictions.
 
Note that scores reflect historical model confidence. They do not guarantee future results.
 
Developed and copyrighted by Nojus Barth © 2025.
These predictions are for informational purposes only. Not financial advice.

Developed with Android Studio by Google.
Measures the average absolute difference between predicted and actual returns.\n \nA lower MAE indicates more accurate predictions.
Example:\n \nAn MAE of 2.5 % means predictions deviate by ~2.5 percentage points on average.
Shows how often the model correctly predicts the direction of movement (up or down).\n \nHigher is better.
Example:\n \nA Hit Rate of 70 % means the model was right 7 out of 10 times.

Measures risk-adjusted performance —
 the ratio of excess return to volatility.
 
Values above 1.0 are considered good, above 2.0 excellent.
Example:\n \nA Sharpe Ratio of 1.8 indicates strong returns relative to risk.

Shows the largest price drop for this stock during the evaluation period —
 it measures how much the price fell from its highest point to the lowest afterwards.
 
Smaller (less negative) values mean lower risk.
Example:\n \nA Max Drawdown of –12 % means the stock price once dropped 12 % from its recent peak before recovering.

Combines multiple performance metrics into a single measure of historical model performance.
 The score reflects how consistent and accurate the model’s predictions were during training.
 
It is not a guarantee of future predictions.

Example:
 
A Confidence Score of 80 indicates that the model performed well on historical data, while a score of 20 indicates lower historical performance.
 These values do not guarantee future results.
